title: Raa Raa Sarasaku Lyrics Chandramukhi
stanzas: <div>Raa Raa Sarasaku Song Lyrics From Chandramukhi

raa raa sarasaku rara
raa raa chinthaku chera
praname needhiraa aelukoradora
swaasalo swaasavai raa raa

nee pondu nekkori abhisarikai nenu
vechaanu sumanohara
kaalana marugaina ananda raagalu
vinipincha nilichanuraa

vayasu jaalamo pa ledura
marulugounna chinna dhaani raa
tanuvu baadha teercha
raavera raavera

sala sala ragilina
paruvapu soda idi
tadi budi tadi budi
tapanala swaramidi
ra ra ra ra  ra ra ra ra

ye banthamo
idhi ye bandhamo
ye janma bandhaala sumaganthamo

ye swapnamo
 idhi ye swapnamo
nayanala naaayadhu
toli swapnamo

virahapu vyadhalanu vinava
ee tadabadhu tanuvunu kanava
maguvala manasulu telisi
nee valapunu marachute suluvaa

idi kani vini eruganu valapula kalayika
sarasaku pilichiti nirasana tagadika
jigi bigi jigi bigi sogasula moravini
mila mila magasiri merupula meriyaga
ra ra ra ra ra ra

laka laka laka laka
thaam tharigida dheem tharigida
dhoam tharigida nam tharigida

thatha tharigida dhithi tharigida
thoam thoam tharigida
nam nam tharigida

thaa dhee dhoam nam cham cham
thaa dhee dhoam nam cham cham
thakita dhikita thomkita namkita
thaka thaka dhina thaka
thatha thalaangu thoam thatha
thalaangu thoam
thagadhi thalaangu thoam
thalaangu thaka jam
thadheemtha naka jam
thalaangu thaka jam
thadheemtha naka jam
thalaangu thaka jam
thadheemtha naka jam

seo.title: Raa Raa Sarasaku Lyrics Chandramukhi
seo.description: Get the complete Raa Raa Sarasaku Lyrics Chandramukhi from Chandramukhi. Read the lyrics penned by Bhuvanachandra and composed by Vidyasagar and sung by Binni Krishnakumar. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Bhuvanachandra, Chandramukhi, Vidyasagar, Binni Krishnakumar, Tipu, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
